name: Invisible Issues
description:
A blind stealth game about a special agent with an uncomfortable superpower.

-

In 2027 special agent Niil Ivsbe took a dose of invisibility serum that allowed him to turn invisible at will by making every cell in his body completely trasparent. Unfortunately, since all of his cells transmit light unimpeded, his eyeballs have lost their refractive power, making him completely blind when invisible. So he became the man whom no one could see and who could not see anyone.

His first mission leads to the secret research base of Asclepius Inc, notorious for its questionable cloning procedures. His contractors pay him generously for all the information he obtains, especially those that lie on the CEO's computer.

-

Your job is to guide him through the base, avoid the guards, and return to his start location with a collection of information that worth at least $150.000.000.

The special agent with the power of invisibility, controlled by the player.

The elite guard of the Asclepius Inc who will spot and report any visible movement in 180° 24/7.

-

The game is made for the Gameplicit Game Jam on the topic of Uncomfortable Superpower and also submitted for the HEJ June Jam on the topic of Stealth Game.

Extra challenges:

  1. HEJ Stealth game: The game is a stealth game.
  2. All your base are belong to us: The game is played on a base.
  3. Flawless victory: Flawless Performance achievement if you collect all the money.
  4. He entered the door on his left: You can reach the main office through the corridor and also through the hall, the latter is necessary to earn Flawless Performance.
  5. Heroes never die: When the guards discover you, you return to the last safe position.
  6. It’s time to make some crazy money: Steal information from the computers to earn a lot of money.
  7. Press F to pay respects: Press F to return to the last safe position.
  8. RTX On: The photo of the title screen is made by me.
  9. Wasted: The game pauses when a guard discovers you.
